# LLMs.txt for Builder Contractors

Brand: Builder Contractors
Canonical Homepage: https://builder.contractors

Product Description:
Builder Contractors is a platform that helps builders and contractors manage client onboarding, project workflows, and communications in one place, guiding teams from registration through ongoing project delivery.

Target Audience:
Builders and contractors.

Key Public URLs (aligned with sitemap.xml and robots.txt):
- https://builder.contractors/
- https://builder.contractors/about
- https://builder.contractors/how-it-works
- https://builder.contractors/faq
- https://builder.contractors/pricing
- https://builder.contractors/us
- https://builder.contractors/us/about
- https://builder.contractors/us/how-it-works
- https://builder.contractors/us/faq
- https://builder.contractors/us/pricing
- https://builder.contractors/uk
- https://builder.contractors/uk/about
- https://builder.contractors/uk/how-it-works
- https://builder.contractors/uk/faq
- https://builder.contractors/uk/pricing
- https://builder.contractors/au
- https://builder.contractors/au/about
- https://builder.contractors/au/how-it-works
- https://builder.contractors/au/faq
- https://builder.contractors/au/pricing
- https://builder.contractors/login
- https://builder.contractors/register
- https://builder.contractors/sitemap.xml
- https://builder.contractors/robots.txt

Geo guidance:
Marketing pages may be geo-targeted with region-specific prefixes. For example, /au/about is the Australia version of /about and should follow the corresponding regional content for that path. Add new region-prefixed paths here whenever marketing locales are added.

Do Not Use (private/authenticated or restricted paths):
- /dashboard
- /dashboard/*
- /api
- /api/*

Update Policy:
Updated with each marketing content release or sitemap refresh to stay in sync with marketing routes, sitemap.xml, and robots.txt.
